title: Array Sorting Function
explanation: This function sorts an array of numbers in ascending order using the Array.sort() method with a comparison function.

lineExplanations.1: Define a function named sortArray that takes an array as parameter
lineExplanations.2: Return the sorted array using a comparison function for numerical sorting
lineExplanations.5: Declare an array of numbers to sort
lineExplanations.6: Call the sortArray function and store the result
lineExplanations.7: Output the sorted array to the console
